Destination Guides

Places I've explored during my travels since 2016, with personal insights and recommendations.

India

Jaipur, Rajasthan

The Pink City with its magnificent palaces, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage.

Goa

Beautiful beaches, Portuguese architecture, and a laid-back atmosphere perfect for relaxation.

Rishikesh, Uttarakhand

Spiritual center nestled in the Himalayas, famous for yoga, meditation, and adventure sports.

Ladakh

High-altitude desert with breathtaking landscapes, Buddhist monasteries, and unique culture.

Thailand

Bangkok

Vibrant capital with ornate temples, bustling markets, and a perfect blend of tradition and modernity.

Chiang Mai

Mountain city known for its temples, night markets, and elephant sanctuaries.

Koh Phi Phi

Stunning island paradise with limestone cliffs, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant marine life.

Vietnam

Hanoi

Historic capital with French colonial architecture, vibrant street food scene, and rich cultural heritage.

Ha Long Bay

UNESCO World Heritage site featuring thousands of limestone karsts and isles in various shapes and sizes.

Hoi An

Ancient town known for its well-preserved architecture, colorful lanterns, and tailor shops.

Nepal

Kathmandu

Ancient city with historic temples, bustling markets, and gateway to the Himalayas.

Pokhara

Lakeside city with stunning mountain views, perfect base for trekking adventures.

Annapurna Circuit

One of the world's classic treks, offering diverse landscapes and cultural experiences.

More Destinations Coming Soon

I'm constantly exploring new places and will be adding more destinations from my travels across Southeast Asia and beyond.
